revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Edimax |model=BR-6475nD |revision=A |upc=649659019607 |ean=4710700927533 |asin=B000Z4J29Q |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=06/08/2011 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=True |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=common |type=wireless router |fcc_id=NDD9564751027 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3662 |cpu1_cspeed=500 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV640EBTI-70G |fla1_num= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model=W9751G6JB-25 |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 (solder pads) |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag= |serial=yes,, (57600,8,N,1) |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3662 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi2_chip1_model=RT3092 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8367R |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Microchip;SST12LP15A;;2; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE2537L;;2; |tp_firmware=Padavan ? |802dot11_protocols=abgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=1234 |oui=80:1F:02 |oui_eth=80:1F:02 }} '''300Mbps Wireless Concurrent Dual-Band Gigabit iQ Router''' :[http://www.edimax.com/edimax/merchandise/merchandise_detail/data/edimax/global/wireless_routers_n300_dual_band/br-6475nd/ Product page] :[http://www.edimax.com/images/Image/OpenSourceCode/Wireless/Router/BR-6475nD/Edimax_RT3662_6X75nD_GPL_20110920.zip '''Edimax''''s GPL source code for the device] (build environment is Fedora 7 i386) This device supports AP, STA, Bridge, WDS, and ''universal repeater'' modes. "1244-00000737-50Z" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. FCC docs show two USB ports installed, but this model does not have any populated USB ports. :Note: [http://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/files/Ralink/RT3662%20product%20brief.pdf The RT3662 SoC only has two native USB 2.0 host IFs] :.. or 1x host and 1x slave/device. The FCC test report lists the following as identical models *[[Edimax BR-6475nD]], GR-475nD, EW-7475PDD *Intellinet 525039 *SMC SMCE21011 V2 *[http://uk.hardware.info/productinfo/126429/edimax-br-6475nd On '''uk.hardware.info'''] :The 2.4GHz radio is using two '''Microchip''' ('''SST''') Power Amplifier ICs (SST12LP15A?). :The 5GHz radio is using two [http://www.skyworksinc.com/Product.aspx?ProductID=944 '''Skyworks''' ('''SiGe''') SE2537L] 5GHz Power Amplifier ICs. :The third receive chain is unpopulated. There are only two antennas in use. :[http://www.xfastest.com/thread-83609-1-1.html Testing of the device on '''XFastest''' (CN)] (w/ good external and Web UI images) '''EDIMAX''' (2.4GHz) and '''EDIMAX2''' (5GHz) SSIDs (probably changed from default?) :The sample SSIDs shown in the manual are '''Edimax''', 80:1F:02 OUIs :If not these or '''EDIMAX'''+'''EDIMAX2''', the default SSIDs :may ''possibly'' be '''Edimax2.4GHz''' and '''Edimax5GHz'''. The power adapter shown in the FCC photos and on '''XFastest''' is a :'''DVE''' DSA-12GX-12 FUS 120120 (100-240VAC ~ 50/60Hz, 0.3A -> 12VDC, 1A). ==Serial== The serial port is shown as being under the PoE board in the FCC photos. :It is '''almost certainly''' omitted in this particular model. ===Pinout=== 
To RTL8367R <--   [ (TxD) (GND) (RxD) ][ (Vcc) ]    --> To LEDs
==Images== File:BR-6475nD Board top.png|board top, from the FCC, serial pinout marked File:BR-6475nD RTL8367R Switch.jpg|the RTL8367R Switch File:Board bottom.png|Bottom view [[Has images::internal| ]]
